content: in this legal case a court has made a final decision regarding the dissolution of a legal community property between two parties the court declares that the property is jointly owned by the parties and orders its division one party is ordered to pay a settlement amount to the other party as well as the remaining mortgage instalments on the property additionally this party is also ordered to pay the other party for mortgage instalments due from a specific period the court cites various articles of the civil code in its decision and uses a courtappointed experts report to determine the division of the property the court rejects certain claims made by both parties and orders one party to pay a debt to a third party the court offsets the legal costs between the parties and determines that the defendant should bear the costs of the courtappointed experts report
